name: a2x1_config_bits
title: A2x1 Config Bits
author: Inguss
description:
Provides Several Quality of Life improvements
 Configurable: Game Map Always day, Player inventory space, movement/walking/running speed and mining speed, Ability to disable and boost Player Hand Crafting speed, Electricity pole range, Laboratory research speed, Furnace, mining-drill and assembling-machine Base Productivity
